Recent Sightings

Timberline Grove

Elevation ~3,050 m 路 Spruce/Fir mix

Two juveniles observed "leap-laddering" branches post-storm. Brief surface flicks in canopy pool.

Misty Notch

Elevation ~2,780 m 路 Dense moss mats

Adult gliding between boughs using prehensile fins; moth activity dispersed shortly after.

North Aspect Spur

Elevation ~3,200 m 路 Fog drip corridor

Subtle ripples in canopy pool followed by seed cone jostling; likely foraging behavior.

Send details (location, elevation, canopy species, recent precipitation) and optional photos to reports@treetrout.org. Please avoid climbing near sensitive epiphytic mats.
